channel.title: Kingdom Of Asgard - Something New!
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0P9CS.png[/img][/center] [center][b]Server Development thread:[/b] [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,565878.msg4116004.html]Kingdom Of Asgard - Something New![/center]__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[ul][li][iurl=#introduction]Introduction[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#goals]Goals/Plans[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#server]Server Developers[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#client]Client Developers[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#apply]Applying layout[/iurl][/li][/ul]
[center][anchor=introduction][b]Introduction:[/b][/center]
- Kingdom Of Asgard was formally known as [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,514816.msg3737440.html]Vertigo[/url], a project originally started by Artem543 and AtomicInt_. A few days ago, Arty messaged me on MSN and asked if I wanted to start a project with him, I said sure. He told me what 'base' we were going to use, what he wants done, etc. I thought [i]Vertigo[/i] was a perfect server to build off because of the uniqueness and creativity it has that others seem to lack. Him and I are aware that this project will require willpower and patience, we are willing to work as long as it takes to make sure everything is near perfect for the official release.
[center][anchor=goals][b]Goals/Plans[/b][/center]
[center]- As of now, our goals may be basic, just please, stick with us as we move up to bigger and better things. The goals consist of; but not limited to:[/center]
[ul][li]Patch all known bugs/glitches[/li] [li]Complete all teleports[/li] [li]Complete all bosses[/li] [li]Improve skilling[/li] [li]Implement unique and original content[/li][/ul]
Yes, as I stated above, our goals are simple/basic. Just note, we are attempting to improve the gameplay and enhance the server quality all together.
[center][anchor=server][b]Server Developers:[/b]
- [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=454285]Artem543[/url] - [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=577589]sour[/url][/center]
[center][anchor=client][b]Client Developers[/b]
- [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=454285]Artem543[/url][/center]
[center][anchor=apply][b]Applying Layout:[/b][/center]
[center][code]Name: MSN/Skype: Experience Proof: Why do you want to join KOA: Extras:[/code][/center]
[b]Note:[/b] If you want to see media, please visit the KOA [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,565878.msg4116004.html]Development Thread[/url], as all media will be uploaded there. Thanks! :)

item.title: Kingdom Of Asgard - Something New!
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Team_Rocket:

Please make your N.P.C. face different directions… I hate it when N.P.C. are just facing a wall the entire time. Very easily done and yet nobody does it.

I agree. There’s a tutorial here:
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/417797-pi-how-make-npc-face-different-directions-walk-pi.html

item.title: Kingdom Of Asgard - Something New!
item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

Ruby:

Because all of the content has been brought in before, just because there’s a small map been included doesn’t mean it’s anything special.

Is this advertising thread? If you answer no, that means it’s in progress. This server is not done yet. I’m working hard to fix stability and fixing all kinds of bugs. This weekend, I’ll try to work on some new contents.

Read full topic

item.title: Kingdom Of Asgard - Something New!
item.dc:creator: @sour sour
item.description:
@sour wrote:

Team_Rocket:

Exactly how do you plan on bringing “unique and creative” to the table?

We have a few ideas of our own, however, we are somewhat relying on our ‘followers’ to suggest what they’d like to see and think would be unique. Since we are going to host this in the future, we don’t want to make all the decisions ourselves. We’re not going to be playing the server, the players will be playing, so why shouldn’t we add what they want? They will spend their time playing our server, so the least we could do is make it enjoyable.

With this being said, when we come up with an outstanding (unique/original idea) we will release it for all to see. We hope to get suggestions/ways to improve our ideas. So, if you are going to be keeping up with this development, it’s only a matter of time before we release our first idea.

Read full topic

[center][anchor=introduction]Introduction:[/center]

  • Kingdom Of Asgard was formally known as Vertigo, a project originally started by Artem543 and AtomicInt_. A few days ago, Arty messaged me on MSN and asked if I wanted to start a project with him, I said sure. He told me what ‘base’ we were going to use, what he wants done, etc. I thought Vertigo was a perfect server to build off because of the uniqueness and creativity it has that others seem to lack. Him and I are aware that this project will require willpower and patience, we are willing to work as long as it takes to make sure everything is near perfect for the official release.

[center][anchor=goals]Goals/Plans[/center]

[center]- As of now, our goals may be basic, just please, stick with us as we move up to bigger and better things. The goals consist of; but not limited to:[/center]

[ul][li]Patch all known bugs/glitches[/li]
[li]Complete all teleports[/li]
[li]Complete all bosses[/li]
[li]Improve skilling[/li]
[li]Implement unique and original content[/li][/ul]

Yes, as I stated above, our goals are simple/basic. Just note, we are attempting to improve the gameplay and enhance the server quality all together.
